text: Rosemary Jeanne Harris (20 February 1923 - 14 October 2019) was a British writer of children's fiction. She won the 1968 Carnegie Medal for British children's books. She was known for her The Moon in the Cloud trilogy. Harris was born in London. Harris died on 14 October 2019 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English children's writers Category:Writers from London
title: Rosemary Harris (writer)
